name: Charon Runner
description:
As Charon, navigate the fire river, collect obols and avoid obstacles in your way. Up and Down to steer, Space to restart game.

Gamedev.TV Game Jam 2022 submission. Done in about 2 hours of painful coding - all I could find time-wise for this Jam. This attempt has a lot of issues that I couldn't fix in time. My first attempt at putting something together on my own after doing a portion of Gamedev.TV Unity 2d course. I wanted to make use of the basic scripting lessons, powerups, physics&colliders, powerups, and canvas. Idea for a moving background taken from a video "endless platformer in 5 minutes".
